bodyV2.markdown:
We are unable to accept Society of London Theatre’s theatre tokens; these need to be redeemed directly with the theatre itself.

However, if you want to surprise someone with a trip to the theatre as a gift, you can buy our own LOVEtheatre vouchers that are exclusively for our LOVEtheatre website. These vouchers are redeemable up to a year from purchase and can be redeemed by entering the unique voucher code into the Promo Code field.
